caption: This photograph captures an intense and dramatic moment where a large wave is crashing against a house. The house, visible on the left, features a dark roof with a red edge and a body of light-gray siding. A window with an air conditioning unit is partially visible. The wave, exploding in a dynamic display of power, engulfs the scene with its spray and foam lit by either the sun or another light source, giving parts of the water a glowing effect against the darker tones of the scene. The force of the water is exhibited by the sheer height - it towers above the house’s roofline, emphasizing the power and potentially destructive nature of the wave. The photograph has a moody and slightly surreal quality due to the lighting and color saturation, enhancing the dramatic impact of nature’s force juxtaposed with human habitation.
title: Looking over two-story rooftops to Lake Michigan, as waves explode against a sea wall.
